Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate kadhi'a javega, jihara (bheda) dilam vica hai
Besaka usa dina unham da raba unham tom cagi taram janu hovega
Khara-khara'una vali
Ki hai khara-khara'una vali
Ate tusim ki jano, ki ki hai, uha khara-khara'una vali
Jisa dina loka patagi'a di taram khil'hare ho'e honage
Ate pahara piji ho'i ragali una di taram ho janage
Phira jisa bade da palara bhari hovega
Uha mana bha'unde arama vica hovega
Ate jisa bade da palara haula hovega
Tam usa da tikana kha'i (naraka) hai
Ate tusim ki jano, ki uha ki hai
Bhatakadi ho'i aga. Suru alaha de nama nala jihara ati'ata miharabana ate rahima farama'una vala hai
Zi'ada de lalaca ne tuhanu bhula rakhi'a hai
Ithom taka ki tusim kabaram vica ja puje
Kade vi nahim, tusim bahuta jaladi jana lavauge
Phira kade vi nahim, tusim bahuta jaladi jana lavoge
Kade vi nahim, jekara tusim visavasa de nala janade
Ki tusim naraka nu zarura dekhauge
Phira tusim usa nu visavasa di akha nala dekhoge
Phira usa dina yakinana tuhade tom ni'amatam de sabadhi zarura pucha hovegi
